item.title: About Me
item.description: I am now a Postdoc at CUHK, and completed my PhD in 2.5 years from CUHK on Shenzhen campus. My CV is da. My research focuses on optimizing sparse workloads for modern computing hardware. This involves addressing the challenge of efficiently processing sparse data structures (containing mostly empty or zero values) on hardware designed for dense, regular computations. Parallel Graph algorithms, e,g, PageRank, BFS, Triangle Counting, etc. Sparse matrix multiplication (SpMV, SpMM, SDDMM, SpGEMM) on CPUs and GPUs Graph Neural Network & Sparse Large Language Models.
